title: The Worst Grifters of the Coronavirus Pandemic
itunes:title: The Worst Grifters of the Coronavirus Pandemic
description:
Robert is joined by Jamie Loftus to discuss pandemic grifters.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Gwyneth Paltrow blasted for hawking fancy outfit amid coronavirus pandemic
  2. Makeup Mogul Michelle Phan’s Coronavirus Strategy Is Educate and HODL Bitcoin
  3. Dr. Pimple Popper shut down beauty guru Michelle Phan's claim that burning 'antiviral' essential oils can kill off viruses before they enter your system
  4. As Coronavirus Spreads, Hastily Produced Books Capitalize on Fear
  5. Alex Jones’ Infowars is attempting to profit from the coronavirus outbreak
  6. Televangelist ordered by New York attorney general to stop promoting ‘cure’ for coronavirus
  7. “Eat More Onions!”
  8. Spanish flu: The deadliest pandemic in history
  9. Coronavirus Scam Alert: Beware Fake Fox News Articles Promising A CBD Oil Cure
  10. Giant Silver Solution Bundle

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
